00017 void eol_logger_info(char *msg,...)
00018 {
00019   va_list ap;
00020   va_start(ap,msg);
00021   eol_logger_message(
00022     EOL_LOG_INFO,
00023     msg,
00024     ap);
00025   va_end(ap);
00026 }

00061 void eol_logger_message(eolLogLevel level,char *msg,...)
00062 {
00063   va_list ap;
00064   if (level >= EOL_LOG_MAX)
00065   {
00066     fprintf(stderr,"eol_logger: unable to write at log level %i\n",level);
00067   }
00068   if (level > _eol_log_threshold)return;
00069   if (_eol_logger_stdout_echo == eolTrue)
00070   {
00071     va_start(ap,msg);
00072     vfprintf(stdout,msg,ap);
00073     va_end(ap);
00074   }
00075   if (_eol_logger_file == NULL)
00076   {
00077     fprintf(stderr,"eol_logger: no log file found! Redirecting logs to stdout\n");
00078   _eol_logger_file = stdout;
00079     return;
00080   }
00081   va_start(ap,msg);
00082   vfprintf(_eol_logger_file,msg,ap);
00083   va_end(ap);
00084 }
00085 
00086 void eol_logger_init()
00087 {
00088   if (strlen(_eol_logger_filename) <= 0)
00089   {
00090     sprintf(_eol_logger_filename,"system/engineoflies.log");
00091   }
00092   _eol_logger_file = fopen(_eol_logger_filename, "w");
00093   if (_eol_logger_file == NULL)
00094   {
00095     fprintf(stderr,"unable to open log file.");
00096     return;
00097   }
00098   _eol_logger_initialized = eolTrue;
00099   atexit(eol_logger_deinit);
00100 }
00101 
00102 void eol_logger_deinit(void)
00103 {
00104   if (_eol_logger_file != NULL)
00105   {
00106     fclose(_eol_logger_file);
00107     _eol_logger_file = NULL;
00108   }
00109 }

00111 void eol_logger_set_threshold(eolLogLevel level)
00112 {
00113   if (level < EOL_LOG_MAX)
00114     _eol_log_threshold = level;
00115 }

00117 void eol_logger_load_config()
00118 {
00119   eolLine buf;
00120   eolConfig *conf;
00121   conf = eol_config_load("system/logger.cfg");
00122   if (conf != NULL)
00123   {
00124     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"log_file");
00125     if (strlen(buf) > 0)
00126     {
00127       if (eol_line_cmp(_eol_logger_filename,buf) != 0)
00128       {
00129         eol_line_cpy(_eol_logger_filename,buf);
00130         if (_eol_logger_file != NULL)fclose(_eol_logger_file);
00131         _eol_logger_file = fopen(_eol_logger_filename, "w");
00132       }
00133     }
00134     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"log_level");
00135     if (strlen(buf) > 0)
00136     {
00137       if (eol_line_cmp(buf,"INFO")==0)
00138       {
00139         _eol_log_threshold = EOL_LOG_INFO;
00140       }
00141       else if (eol_line_cmp(buf,"ERROR")==0)
00142       {
00143         _eol_log_threshold = EOL_LOG_ERROR;
00144       }
00145       else if (eol_line_cmp(buf,"WARN")==0)
00146       {
00147         _eol_log_threshold = EOL_LOG_WARN;
00148       }
00149       else if (eol_line_cmp(buf,"FATAL")==0)
00150       {
00151         _eol_log_threshold = EOL_LOG_FATAL;
00152       }
00153       else if (eol_line_cmp(buf,"DEBUG")==0)
00154       {
00155         _eol_log_threshold = EOL_LOG_DEBUG;
00156       }
00157       else if (eol_line_cmp(buf,"NONE")==0)
00158       {
00159         _eol_log_threshold = EOL_LOG_NONE;
00160       }
00161     }
00162     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"echo_to_terminal");
00163     {
00164       if (eol_line_cmp(buf,"true")==0)
00165       {
00166         _eol_logger_stdout_echo = eolTrue;
00167       }
00168       else if (eol_line_cmp(buf,"false")==0)
00169       {
00170         _eol_logger_stdout_echo = eolFalse;
00171       }
00172     }
00173   }
00174 }
